messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for balance saving inquiries.
How can I activate balance saver?
What steps do I follow to activate the Balance Saver plan?
How do I turn on the Balance Saver feature on my Telenor SIM?
Dial *342# to activate the Balance Saver price plan. Charges are Rs. 10 (inclusive of tax). For more details, visit: https://www.telenor.com.pk/price-plans/payg-blocker/
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for balance saving inquiries.
What is the balance saver code?
Can you provide the code for activating Balance Saver?
What's the dial code to start the Balance Saver plan?

If your balance is being charged on using internet, we provide a price plan named Balance Saver price plan. In this package, internet can be used by activating Data Bundles of your choice ONLY. Upon activation of a Data Bundle, spill over rate will be charged as per the relevant bundle till bundle expiry. You can call any number for Rs. 3.5+tax per minute, SMS charges Rs. 1.8+tax. For AJK SMS charges Rs.2.19+tax. For GB SMS charges Rs. 1.841+tax. To avail the above-mentioned price plan, please dial *342#. Charges are Rs. 10 (inclusive of tax). For more details, visit: https://www.telenor.com.pk/price-plans/payg-blocker/
